headline: Prudential Financial Announces Matt Armas as Chief Investment Officer
summary: NEWARK, N.J., December 03, 2025--Prudential Financial, Inc. (NYSE: PRU) announced today that it has appointed Matthew (Matt) Armas senior vice president and chief investment officer, effective March 12, 2026.

raw.headline: Prudential Financial Announces Matt Armas as Chief Investment Officer
raw.summary: NEWARK, N.J., December 03, 2025--Prudential Financial, Inc. (NYSE: PRU) announced today that it has appointed Matthew (Matt) Armas senior vice president and chief investment officer, effective March 12, 2026.

headline: Prudential Advisors Connect mobile app launches, bringing advisor productivity tools to iOS devices, further enhancing the advisor experience
summary: Prudential Advisors, the retail arm of Prudential Financial, Inc. (NYSE: PRU), with more than 3,000 financial advisors and fee-based financial planners who offer clients, including more than 3.5 million American families, a full range of financial advice and solutions, announced today the launch of the Prudential Advisors Connect mobile app, now available for iOS devices.
